text: The 2020–21 Frauen Bundesliga was the 31st season of the Frauen Bundesliga in Germany. It took place from 4 September 2020 to 6 June 2021. Bayern Munich won their third Bundesliga title. == League table == Source: Team 1 Bayern Munich 22 20 1 1 82 9 +73 61 2 VfL Wolfsburg 22 19 2 1 71 17 +54 59 3 1899 Hoffenheim 22 14 2 6 54 23 +31 44 4 1. FFC Turbine Potsdam 22 12 3 7 41 36 +5 39 5 Bayer 04 Leverkusen 22 10 3 9 32 39 –7 33 6 Eintracht Frankfurt 22 9 3 10 43 29 +14 30 7 SC Freiburg 22 9 3 10 30 35 –5 30 8 SGS Essen 22 7 4 11 30 37 –7 25 9 Werder Bremen 22 6 1 15 23 67 –44 19 10 SC Sand 22 5 3 14 21 53 –32 18 11 SV Meppen 22 3 5 14 16 52 –36 14 12 MSV Duisburg 22 1 4 17 15 61 –46 7 == Top scorers == 23 goals * Nicole Billa (1899 Hoffenheim) 17 goals * Laura Freigang (Eintracht Frankfurt) 16 goals * Lea Schüller (Bayern Munich) 13 goals * Milena Nikolić (Bayer Leverkusen) 11 goals * Zsanett Jakabfi (VfL Wolfsburg) 10 goals * Sydney Lohmann (Bayern Munich) 8 goals * Viviane Asseyi (Bayern Munich) * Klara Bühl (Bayern Munich) * Selina Cerci (Turbine Potsdam) * Ewa Pajor (VfL Wolfsburg) == References == == Other websites == * News, Matchdetails, Teams, Transfers on weltfussball.de * Season on dfb.de Category:2020–21 in European football Frauen Bundesliga Category:Football in Germany
